segments.text: the Canadian rock singer ? But I heard you had a part-time job yesterday . How did you see her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yeah , I worked as temporary staff in her concert . Look , her poster , a CD ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: so you're a big fan , eh ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: not really . But I like some of her songs . She's actually very talented . She's a song writer and fashion and fashion designer , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: and she was in a movie once again , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , though I don't think her acting skills are that great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what was your impression of her when you saw her in person ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: she looked sweeter than her pictures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: did you take a photo with her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no , there were too many people . When she got out of the car , her fans were all screaming , trying to give her flowers and ger her autographs .
segments.speaker: S1
